insults.insult: I'd like to see things from your point of view but I can't seem to get my head that far up my ass.
You look like something I'd draw with my left hand.
I'm jealous of all the people that haven't met you!.
I may love to shop but I'm not buying your bullshit.
If you spoke your mind, you'd be speechless.
Better to let people think you're smart until you open your mouth and prove them wrong.
Roses are red, violets are blue, I have 5 fingers, the 3rd ones for you.
If I wanted to kill myself I'd climb your ego and jump to your IQ.
Is your ass jealous of the amount of shit that just came out of your mouth?
The last time I saw a face like yours I fed it a banana.
For those who never forget a face, you are an exception.
If assholes could fly, your place would be an airport!
I'd like to see things from your point of view but I can't seem to get my head that far up my ass.
We all sprang from apes, but you didn't spring far enough.
You are proof that God has a sense of humor.
It's too bad stupidity isn't painful.
You have delusions of adequacy.
You consistently meet my expectations.
You're not the dumbest person in the world, but you better hope he doesn't die.
It is impossible to underestimate you.
All I know is one of us is right, and the other one is you.
I'd agree with you, but then we would both be wrong.
I don't know what your problem is, but I bet it's really hard for you to pronounce.
Somewhere out there, there’s a tree whose single purpose on earth is to replace the oxygen you waste. Go find it and apologize.
Your existence disproves 'survival of the fittest'
Not saying I hate you, but I would unplug your life support to charge my phone.
I expected nothing, but I’m still disappointed.
